title: Pixel phone
content:
Hi

I have never used pixel phone ever as am using iphone 6 since 2015 and samsung before that now its big time to upgrade for me and awaiting for iphone 12, buy somehow am atttacted more towards pixel but unfortunately pixel 5 is not coming to India and if then it would really expensive for its specs.

My query is if i buy or get pixel 5 or 4a 5g from USA and use in India then will it work seamlessly like all its features even 5g in future in India ?

If then can think about it

Though i know there is 4a launching on oct 17 in india but it wont be future proof but still will think about it.

Let me know about pixel 5 or 4a 5g phones workability in India if bought from USA

Thank you. Stay safe

Regards
